description: Comprehensive study designed to gather feedback and insights from consumers regarding their preferences, satisfaction levels, and usage habits related to various cleaning products. This research typically includes questions about product effectiveness, safety, scent, packaging, and pricing, aiming to provide valuable data to manufacturers and marketers for product improvement and targeted marketing strategies.
instructionMessage:
1. Please take a few minutes to complete this survey about cleaning products. Your honest feedback will help us better understand your preferences and needs in this category.
 2. We value your input! Kindly share your opinions and experiences with cleaning products by answering the following questions. Your responses will assist us in providing you with products that best meet your expectations.
 3. Thank you for participating in our cleaning product survey. Your insights are important to us, so please respond candidly to the questions below, helping us enhance our offerings to better serve your cleaning needs.

questions.question: Which name do you prefer for an All Purpose Cleaner?
What form of Multi-Purpose household cleaner do you usually buy?
options: Liquid (pour into a bucket of water)

questions.question: What type of bottle do you prefer?
Where do you usually buy your multi-purpose household cleaner?
options: I do not buy Muli-Purpose Household Cleaners

questions.question: How important is Impact on Environment when it comes to your decision to purchase a household Multi-Purpose Cleaner. Rate on a scale of 1-5, with 1 being VERY important and 5 being NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL.
Which of the following do you have at home?
What brand of Multi-Purpose Household Cleaners do you usually purchase? (You may choose more than one answer)
How likely would you be to try a new household cleaner on the market (1 = Very Likely, 5 = Not Likely at All)?
